# SEO Optimization Agent

Multi-agent system for auditing and optimizing SEO on MkDocs sites.

## Quick Start

```bash
# Audit your site
python seo_agent.py --mode audit

# Get fix suggestions
python seo_agent.py --mode suggest

# Apply fixes interactively
python seo_agent.py --mode fix
```

## Features

- Audits meta tags, content structure, technical SEO, and links
- Generates actionable fix suggestions
- Interactive approval workflow
- Detailed reporting

## Agent registered

The agent is registered as `seo-optimizer` in `agents_md/seo-optimizer.md`.

See full documentation in the agent file.
